snippet: For Gordon Hartman, a former real estate developer who retired at 41, the sport is part of a larger mission he calls Soccer for a Cause.
lead_paragraph: For Gordon Hartman, a former real estate developer who retired at 41, the sport is part of a larger mission he calls Soccer for a Cause.

headline.seo: Investing in Soccer, but Not for a Profit
